msg: Add dependency on javax.persistence API library now JPA adapter has been moved from core15 to core.

author: skitching
msg: Move JpaPersistenceContextFactory from the core15 module to the core module, as it is possible to use Orchestra persistence without annotations.
Note that this is a binary-compatible change, as no classnames have changed.

msg: Exclude servlet api coming from the Felix artifacts.
